Term.Name: AR-INCAA
Term.Definition: Argentina
Institute of Film and Audiovisual Arts through the Advisory Commission of Cinematographic Exhibition
Instituto de Cine y Artes Audiovisuales, Comisión Asesora de Exhibición Cinematográfica

Term.Name: ATP
Term.Definition: Apta (para) Todo Público
For all ages
Not under 13
Apto para mayores de 13 años
Not under 16
Apto para mayores de 16 años
Not under 18
Apto para mayores de 18 años

Term.Name: X
Term.Definition: Explicit

Term.Name: E
Term.Definition: Exempt: sports, music, etc.

Term.Name: AT-BMUKK
Term.Definition: Austria
Federal Ministry for Education, the Arts and Culture
Bundesministerium für Unterricht, Kunst und Kultur
For all ages
Freigegeben fur alle Altersstufen
6 years and above
10 years and above
12 years and above
14 years and above
16 years and above

Term.Name: AU-OFLC
Term.Definition: Australia
Office of Film and Literature Classification

Term.Name: G
General
Term.Definition: G classified films and computer games are for general viewing. Many of the films and computer games contain content that would be of no interest to children. The impact of the content is very mild.

Term.Name: PG
Parental Guidance
Term.Definition: PG classified films and computer games may contain material that needs to be explained to children therefore parental guidance is recommended. The impact of the content is mild.

Term.Name: M
Mature
Term.Definition: The M category is recommended for mature audiences. A mature perspective is required to view this material. The impact of the content is moderate.

Term.Name: MA15+
Term.Definition: The MA 15+ category is a legally restricted category. The impact of the content is strong. A person under the age of 15 years must be accompanied by a parent or adult guardian if viewing or buying a film or computer game classified MA 15+.

Term.Name: R18+
Term.Definition: R 18+ classified films are legally restricted to persons 18 years and over because of the high impact content. Some material in this classification may be offensive to some sections of the adult community.

Term.Name: X18+
Restricted to 18 and over
Term.Definition: The X 18+ classification only applies to films that contain sexually explicit material between consenting adults. It is restricted to persons aged 18 years and over and can only be sold or hired legally in the ACT and the Northern Territory. The possession and supply of X 18+ films is prohibited in prescribed areas of the Northern Territory.

Term.Name: AU-ACMA
Term.Definition: Australia
Australian Communications and Media Authority

Term.Name: P
Term.Definition: Pre-school

Term.Name: C
Term.Definition: Children

Term.Name: G
Term.Definition: General

Term.Name: PG
Term.Definition: Parental Guidance

Term.Name: M
Term.Definition: Mature

Term.Name: MA15+
Term.Definition: 15 or older

Term.Name: AV15+
Term.Definition: 15 or older with violent content

Term.Name: A
Term.Definition: Adult

Term.Name: V
Term.Definition: Violence

Term.Name: L
Term.Definition: Language

Term.Name: S
Term.Definition: Sex

Term.Name: H
Term.Definition: Horror

Term.Name: D
Term.Definition: Drugs

Term.Name: N
Term.Definition: Nudity

Term.Name: SN
Term.Definition: Supernatural

Term.Name: M
Term.Definition: Medical

Term.Name: W
Term.Definition: War

Term.Name: B
Term.Definition: Colorful behaviour

Term.Name: BE
Term.Definition: Belgium

Term.Name: KT
EA
Term.Definition: Kinderen Toegelaten
Enfants admis
Children admitted - Suitable for all

Term.Name: KNT
ENA
Term.Definition: Kinderen Niet Toegelaten
Enfants Non admis
Children not admitted (below 16 years of age)

Term.Name: BG-FIA
Term.Definition: Bulgaria
Film Industry Act

Term.Name: A
Term.Definition: When the film confirms the ideals of humanism or popularizes the national and world cultures or contributes to upbringing children

Term.Name: B
Term.Definition: When the film is in no way contrary to the universal rules of morality in this country, has no restrictive recommendations from the Committee and does not fall in rating A
All ages

Term.Name: C
Term.Definition: When the film contains certain erotic scenes or scenes with drinking, taking drugs or stimulants or a few scenes of violence
For 12 and over

Term.Name: D
Term.Definition: When the film contains quite a number of erotic scenes or scenes with drinking, taking drugs or stimulants or a considerable number of scenes showing violence
For 16 and over

Term.Name: X
Term.Definition: When the film is naturalistically erotic or shows violence in an ostentatious manner

Term.Name: BR-DJCTQ
Term.Definition: Brazil
Department of Justice, Rating, Titles and Qualification
Departamento de Justiça, Classificação, Títulos e Qualificação

Term.Name: ER
Term.Definition: Especialmente Recomendado para Crianças e Adolescentes

Especially Recommended for Children and Adolescents. This rating means that the film is especially advised for children and adolescents. Contains educational material, and doesn't have any inappropriate content.

Term.Name: L
Term.Definition: Livre para Todos os Públicos
This rating means that the film/game can be watched/played by anyone and doesn't have any inappropriate content
This film/game is recommended for persons with or over 10 years of age. May contain a little inappropriate language, sexual innuendo, or mild violence.
Não Recomendando para Menores de 10 Anos
This film/game is recommended for persons with or over 12 years of age. May contain a little inappropriate language, sexual innuendo, or mild violence.
Não Recomendando para Menores de 12 Anos

This film/game is recommended for persons with or over 14 years of age. May contain inappropriate language, sexual innuendo and/or mild sex with no nudity or the act being explicit shown, violence, mention to drug use.
Não Recomendando para Menores de 14 Anos
This film/game is recommended for persons with or over 16 years of age. May contain strong language, sexual innuendo and/or mild sex with or without mild nudity, strong violence, drug use.
Não Recomendando para Menores de 16 Anos

This film/game is forbidden for people under 18 years of age. It may contain strong language, intense sex, strong nudity, strong violence, intense drug use. It is also used to rate pornographic films..
Não Recomendando para Menores de 18 Anos

Term.Name: CA-CHVRS
Term.Definition: Canada
Canadian Home Video Rating System

Term.Name: G
General
Term.Definition: Suitable for viewing by all ages

Term.Name: PG
Parental Guidance
Term.Definition: Parental guidance advised. Theme or content may not be suitable for all children.

Term.Name: 14A
Term.Definition: Suitable for people 14 years of age or older. Those under 14 should view with an adult. No rental or purchase by those under 14 where prohibited by law. Parents cautioned. May contain violence, coarse language and/or sexually suggestive scenes.

Term.Name: 18A
Term.Definition: Suitable for people 18 years of age or older. Persons under 18 should view with an adult. No rental or purchase by those under 18. Parents strongly cautioned. Will likely contain explicit violence, frequent coarse language, sexual activity and/or horror.

Term.Name: R
Restricted
Term.Definition: Restricted to 18 years and older. No rental or purchase by those under 18. Contents not suitable for minors. Contains frequent sexual activity, brutality/graphic violence, intense horror, and/or other disturbing content.

Term.Name: E
Exempt
Term.Definition: Contains material not subject to classification, such as documentaries, nature, travel, music, arts and culture, sports and leisure, educational and instructional information.

Term.Name: CA-AFR
Term.Definition: Canada
Alberta Film rating

Term.Name: G
General
Term.Definition: Suitable for viewing by all ages

Term.Name: PG
Parental Guidance
Term.Definition: Parental guidance advised. Theme or content may not be suitable for all children.

Term.Name: 14A
Term.Definition: Suitable for people 14 years of age or older. Those under 14 should view with an adult. No rental or purchase by those under 14 where prohibited by law. Parents cautioned. May contain violence, coarse language and/or sexually suggestive scenes.

Term.Name: 18A
Term.Definition: Suitable for people 18 years of age or older. Persons under 18 should view with an adult. No rental or purchase by those under 18. Parents strongly cautioned. Will likely contain explicit violence, frequent coarse language, sexual activity and/or horror.

Term.Name: R
Restricted
Term.Definition: Restricted to 18 years and older. No rental or purchase by those under 18. Contents not suitable for minors. Contains frequent sexual activity, brutality/graphic violence, intense horror, and/or other disturbing content.

Term.Name: A
Adult
Term.Definition: Admittance restricted to persons 18 years of age or older. Content not suitable for minors. Contains predominantly sexually explicit activity.

Term.Name: CA-OFRB
Term.Definition: Canada
Ontario Film Review Board

Term.Name: G
General
Term.Definition: Suitable for viewing by all ages

Term.Name: PG
Parental Guidance
Term.Definition: Parental guidance advised. Theme or content may not be suitable for all children.

Term.Name: 14A
Term.Definition: Suitable for people 14 years of age or older. Those under 14 should view with an adult. No rental or purchase by those under 14 where prohibited by law. Parents cautioned. May contain violence, coarse language and/or sexually suggestive scenes.

Term.Name: 18A
Term.Definition: Suitable for people 18 years of age or older. Persons under 18 should view with an adult. No rental or purchase by those under 18. Parents strongly cautioned. Will likely contain explicit violence, frequent coarse language, sexual activity and/or horror.

Term.Name: R
Restricted
Term.Definition: Restricted to 18 years and older. No rental or purchase by those under 18. Contents not suitable for minors. Contains frequent sexual activity, brutality/graphic violence, intense horror, and/or other disturbing content.

Term.Name: CA-RCQ
Term.Definition: Canada
Regie du cinema du Quebec

Term.Name: G
Term.Definition: General
Le film peut être vu, loué ou acheté sans risque par des personnes de tout âge
For all ages
Le film ne peut être vu, acheté ou loué que par des personnes de 13 ans et plus. Les enfants de moins de 13 ans peuvent y avoir accès s’ils sont accompagnés par un adulte.
For 13 and older in presence of an adult
Le film ne peut être vu, acheté ou loué que par des personnes de 16 ans et plus.
Only for 16 and older
Le film ne peut être vu, acheté ou loué que par des personnes de 18 ans et plus.
Only for 18 and older

Term.Name: CA-CBSC-CCNR-English and third-languages
Term.Definition: Canada
Ratings Classification for Canadian English-Language and Third-Language Broadcasters

Term.Name: C
Term.Definition: Children

Term.Name: C8
Term.Definition: Children over 8 years

Term.Name: G
General
Term.Definition: Considered acceptable for all age groups. Appropriate viewing for the entire family.

Term.Name: PG
Parental Guidance
Term.Definition: This programming, while intended for a general audience, may not be suitable for younger children (under the age of 8). Parents/guardians should be aware that there might be content elements which some could consider inappropriate for unsupervised viewing by children in the 8-13 age range.
Over 14 Years
Over 18 Years

Term.Name: CA-CBSC-CCNR-French
Term.Definition: Canada
Ratings Classification for Canadian French-Language Broadcasters

Term.Name: G
Term.Definition: General
Le film peut être vu, loué ou acheté sans risque par des personnes de tout âge
For all ages
General, non approprié pour jeunes enfants de moins e 8 ans
General – Not Suitable for Young Children
Le film ne peut être vu, acheté ou loué que par des personnes de 13 ans et plus. Les enfants de moins de 13 ans peuvent y avoir accès s’ils sont accompagnés par un adulte.
For 13 and older in presence of an adult
Le film ne peut être vu, acheté ou loué que par des personnes de 16 ans et plus.
Only for 16 and older
Le film ne peut être vu, acheté ou loué que par des personnes de 18 ans et plus.
Only for 18 and older

Term.Name: CL-ANATEL
Term.Definition: Chile
Asociación Nacional de Televisión
National Broadcasting Association rating system

Term.Name: I
Term.Definition: Infantil
For all ages

Term.Name: I7
Term.Definition: Infantil para mayores de 7 años
For ages 7 and older

Term.Name: I12
Term.Definition: Infantil para mayores de 12 años
For ages 12 and older

Term.Name: F
Term.Definition: Familiar
Shows suitable for all ages, regardless of specific content.

Term.Name: R
Term.Definition: Responsabilidad compartida
Shared responsibility - Children accompanied by an adult.

Term.Name: A
Term.Definition: Adulto
For adult audiences only (ages 18 or older). Shows that contain explicit language, sex scenes, explicit situations

Term.Name: CL-CCC
Term.Definition: Chile
Movie ratings as defined by the Chilean Council of Cinematographic Classification
Consejo de Calificacion Cinematografica

Term.Name: TE
Term.Definition: Todo expectador
All Audiences
Mayor de 14 anos
Inappropriate for children under 14
Mayor de 18 anos
Suitable for people aged 18 and over

Term.Name: 18/S
Term.Definition: Suitable for people aged 18 and over with sexually explicit content

Term.Name: 18/V
Term.Definition: Suitable for people aged 18 and over with extreme violence content

Term.Name: CN-HK-HKBA
Term.Definition: Hong-Kong Broadcasting Authority
Hong-Kong

Term.Name: PG
Parental Guidance
Term.Definition: Programmes classified "PG" may contain adult themes or concepts but must remain suitable for children to watch under the guidance of a parent or guardian.

Term.Name: M
Mature
Term.Definition: Programmes classified "M" are recommended for viewing by grown-up members of the family only.

Term.Name: Scenes of extreme suffering and distress
Exorcism, psychic or occultic practice and depiction of the supernatural
CO
Term.Definition: Colombia
Movie ratings as defined by the Colombian Ministry of Culture

Term.Name: T
Term.Definition: Todos
All Audiences
Suitable for people aged 7 and over
Suitable for people aged 12 and over
Suitable for people aged 15 and over
Suitable for people aged 18 and over

Term.Name: X
Term.Definition: Adulto
Adult - Pornographic Content

Term.Name: DE-FSF
Term.Definition: Freiwillige Selbskontrolle Fernsehen Altersfreigabe
German TV content classification
For all ages
Ohne Altersbeschränkung
No one under 6 years admitted
Freigegeben ab 6 Jahren
People 12 or older admitted, children between 6 and 11 only when accompanied by parent or legal guardian
Freigegeben ab 12 Jahren
People 16 or older admitted
Freigegeben ab 16 Jahren
"No youth admitted", only adults
Keine Jugendfreigabe

Term.Name: DE-FSK
Term.Definition: Germany
Voluntary Self-Control of the Film Business' rating
Freiwillige Selbstkontrolle der Filmwirtschaft Altersfreigabe

Term.Name: FSK 0
Term.Definition: For all ages
Ohne Altersbeschränkung

Term.Name: FSK 6
Term.Definition: No one under 6 years admitted
Freigegeben ab 6 Jahren

Term.Name: FSK 12
Term.Definition: People 12 or older admitted, children between 6 and 11 only when accompanied by parent or legal guardian
Freigegeben ab 12 Jahren

Term.Name: FSK 16
Term.Definition: People 16 or older admitted
Freigegeben ab 16 Jahren

Term.Name: FSK 18
Term.Definition: "No youth admitted", only adults
Keine Jugendfreigabe

Term.Name: DK-MBU
Term.Definition: Denmark
Medieradet for barn och unga - Media Advice for Children and Youths (Denmark)
Scheme as defined by the Danish Media Council for Children and Young People

Term.Name: A
Term.Definition: Approval of the film for general admittance
Approval of the film for general admittance, but not recommended for children under the age of 7
Approval of the film for admittance of children from the age of 11
Approval of the film for admittance of children from the age of 15

Term.Name: DK-DR
Term.Definition: Denmark
Denmark Radio

Term.Name: Green
Term.Definition: All ages

Term.Name: Yellow
Term.Definition: Adult supervision

Term.Name: Red
Term.Definition: Adult

Term.Name: ES
Term.Definition: Spain

Term.Name: ERI
Term.Definition: Especial recomendado para la infancia
Specially recommended for children under 7

Term.Name: TP
Term.Definition: Todos los publicos
Suitable for the general public
For 7 and older
For 13 and older
For 18 and older

Term.Name: EU-PEGI
Term.Definition: Europe
Pan European Game Information
Suitable for ages 3 and over. Contains very mild violence or suggestive themes.
These games are the same as Early Childhood ratings but may include content descriptors like mild violence and in a rare case, very mild action violence.
Suitable only for persons of over ages 12 and older. This rating contains mild action violence or suggestive themes and mildly suggestive song lyrics.
This rating is suitable only for persons of 16 years of age or older. Some situations include strong action violence, mild references to gambling, and rude humor.
This rating is suitable only for persons 18 years of age and older with graphic violence, strong sexual content, explicit references to gambling, and vulgar language (spoken and used in song lyrics)

Term.Name: FI-VET
Term.Definition: Valtion elokuvatarkastamo
Finnish Board of Film Classification

Term.Name: S
Term.Definition: For all ages

Term.Name: K-3
Term.Definition: For all ages

Term.Name: K-7
Term.Definition: For people aged 7 years and above

Term.Name: PG
Term.Definition: Parental Guidance option - children 2 years of age under the K limits may access the show in presence of an accompanying adult

Term.Name: K-11
Term.Definition: For people aged 11 years and above

Term.Name: PG
Term.Definition: Parental Guidance option - children 2 years of age under the K limits may access the show in presence of an accompanying adult

Term.Name: K-13
Term.Definition: For people aged 13 years and above

Term.Name: PG
Term.Definition: Parental Guidance option - children 2 years of age under the K limits may access the show in presence of an accompanying adult

Term.Name: K-15
Term.Definition: For people aged 15 years and above

Term.Name: PG
Term.Definition: Parental Guidance option - children 2 years of age under the K limits may access the show in presence of an accompanying adult

Term.Name: K-18
Term.Definition: For people aged 18 years and above

Term.Name: PG
Term.Definition: Parental Guidance option - children 2 years of age under the K limits may access the show in presence of an accompanying adult

Term.Name: FR-CNC
Term.Definition: Centre National de Cinematographie

Term.Name: Tout public
For all audiences
Term.Definition: For all audiences
Interdiction de représentation aux moins de douze ans
Unsuitable for minors under 12
Interdiction de représentation aux moins de seize ans
Unsuitable for minors under 16

Interdiction de représentation aux moins de dix-huit ans, prévoit que cette restriction peut concerner les œuvres qui comportent « des scènes de sexe non simulées ou de très grande violence mais qui, par la manière dont elles sont filmées et la nature du thème traité ne justifient pas » d’un classement X

Unsuitable for minors under 18, may apply to works with non-simulated sexual acts or extreme violence, but do not apply to X rating due to the nature of the theme being treated or the way it has been filmed

Term.Name: X
Term.Definition: Programme pour adultes - Contenu de nature pornographie
Adult only, pornographic content

Term.Name: FR-CSA
Term.Definition: Conseil Superieur de l'Audiovisuel
Pas pour les moins de dix ans
Not Recommended for children under 10
Pas pour les moins de douze ans
Not Recommended for children under 12
Pas pour les moins de seize ans
Not Recommended for children under 16

Pas pour les moins de dix-huit ans, prévoit que cette restriction peut concerner les œuvres qui comportent « des scènes de sexe non simulées ou de très grande violence mais qui, par la manière dont elles sont filmées et la nature du thème traité ne justifient pas » d’un classement X

Unsuitable for minors under 18, may apply to works with non-simulated sexual acts or extreme violence, but do not apply to X rating due to the nature of the theme being treated or the way it has been filmed

Term.Name: X
Term.Definition: Adulte - Contenu de nature pornographie
Adult, pornographic content

Term.Name: GB-BBFC
Term.Definition: British Board of Film Classification

Term.Name: U
Term.Definition: Suitable for all

Term.Name: PG
Term.Definition: General viewing but some scenes may be unsuitable for young children

Term.Name: 12A/12
Term.Definition: Suitable for 12 years and older. No 12 year old child may see a 12A film without the presence of an accompanying adult.
No one under 15 years of age may see a "15" film or rent or buy a "15" video
Suitable only for adults

Term.Name: R18
Term.Definition: To be supplied only in licensed sex shops or cinemas to adults of not less than 18 years of age

Term.Name: IE-IFCO
Term.Definition: Ireland
Irish Film Classification Office

Term.Name: G
Term.Definition: 'A film classified as 'General' should be suitable for children of school going age.

Term.Name: PG
Term.Definition: A film with a 'PG' cert may be watched by unaccompanied children of any age.

Term.Name: 12A
Term.Definition: Films classified in this category are considered to be suitable for those of twelve and upwards. They may also be seen by younger children provided a parent or adult guardian accompanies them.

Term.Name: 15A
Term.Definition: Films classified in this category are considered to be suitable for those of fifteen and upwards. They may also be seen by younger children provided a parent or adult guardian accompanies them.
Films classified in this category are considered to be suitable for persons of sixteen or over. Children under this age cannot be admitted to cinemas.
Adults only

Term.Name: IE-RTE
Term.Definition: Ireland
Irish Film Classification Office

Term.Name: GA
General Audience
Lucht Féachana Ginearálta
Term.Definition: A programme that would be acceptable to all ages and tastes.

Term.Name: CH
Children
Páistí
Term.Definition: a programme aimed specifically at children ages 5–10. May contain mild cartoon or fantasy violence.

Term.Name: YA
Young Adult
Ógra
Term.Definition: a programme aimed at an adolescent audience. That is to say it would not be of great interest to an adult. However, it might deal with issues which affect the teenage and late preteen audience, e.g. relationships, sexual activity, sexuality, soft drugs. Parents and guardians could expect that "YA" programmes might contain such material and may choose to limit their children's access.

Term.Name: PS
Parental Supervision
Treoir Tuismitheora
Term.Definition: a programme aimed at a mature audience (i.e. It might deal with adult themes, be moderately violent, frightening or contain an occasional swear word.) and the classification label invites parents or guardians to consider restricting children's access.

Term.Name: MA
Mature Audience
Lucht Féachana Lánfhásta Amháin
Term.Definition: a typical "post-watershed" program which might contain scenes of strong sexual activity and heavy violence, or the dialogue might be profane.

Term.Name: IT-RAI
Term.Definition: Rating used by Radio Televisione Italiana

Term.Name: Green
Term.Definition: All audiences allowed

Term.Name: Yellow
Term.Definition: Children allowed, but parental guidance is strongly advised.

Term.Name: Red
Term.Definition: adults only.

Term.Name: VM14
Term.Definition: No one under the age of 14 admitted

Term.Name: JA-CERO
Term.Definition: Japan
Computer Entertainment Rating Organization
Tokutei Hieiri Katsudō Hōjin Konpyūta Entāteinmento Rētingu Kikō - 特定非営利活動法人 コンピュータエンターテインメントレーティング機構

Term.Name: A
黒
Black
Term.Definition: All ages

Term.Name: B
緑
Green
Term.Definition: 12歳以上のみ
12 and over

Term.Name: C
青
Blue
Term.Definition: 15歳以上のみ
15 and over

Term.Name: D
橙
Orange
Term.Definition: 17歳以上のみ
17 and over

Term.Name: Z
赤
Red
Term.Definition: 18歳以上のみ
18 and over

Term.Name: KR-KBS
Term.Definition: South Korea
Scheme as defined by the Korea Broadcasting Station

Term.Name: All
Term.Definition: Suitable for all ages
This rating is for programming that may contain material inappropriate for children younger than 7, and parental discretion should be used.

This rating is for programs that may contain material inappropriate for those younger than 12, and parental discretion should be used. Usually used for animations that have stronger themes or violence then those designed for childrens, or for reality variety programs that have mild violence, theme, or language.
This rating is for programs that contain material that may be inappropriate for children under 15, and that parental discretion should be used.
This rating is for programs that are not recommended to those younger than 19.

Term.Name: KR-KMRB
Term.Definition: South Korea
Scheme as defined by the Korea Media Rating Board

Term.Name: All
Term.Definition: Suitable for all ages
Suitable for those aged 12 and over
Suitable for those aged 15 and over

Term.Name: Teenager Restricted
Term.Definition: Unsuitable for those aged under 18

Term.Name: Restricted
Term.Definition: Suitable for those aged 18 and over

Term.Name: MV-NBC
Maldives
Term.Definition: National Bureau of Classification

Term.Name: G
General
Green
Term.Definition: Suitable for all ages
Ages 12 and above
Suitable for ages 15 and above
Suitable for ages 18 and above

Term.Name: PU
Term.Definition: For Professional Use Only

Term.Name: MX-RTC
Mexico
Term.Definition: Dirección General de Radio, Televisión y Cinematografía

Term.Name: AA
Term.Definition: Particularly recommended for children under 7
Comprensible para niños menores de 7 años

Term.Name: A
Term.Definition: For all audiences containing no content requiring parent supervision

Para todo público. Todos los programas bajo esta clasificación son aptos para todo público y no deben contener elementos inadecuados para que los niños los vean sin la supervisión de personas adultas.

Term.Name: B
Term.Definition: For teenagers (ages 12 and older) and adults

Para adolescentes de 12 años en adelante. Son programas aptos para adolescentes y adultos. El material contiene temas o conceptos para adultos, sin embargo es adecuado para que lo vean adolescentes mayores de 12 años.

Term.Name: B15
Term.Definition: For ages 15 and older preferably in presence of supervising adults

No recomendada para menores de 15 años. Aptos para mayores de 15 años. El material clasificado contiene temas o conceptos para adultos, pero sigue siendo adecuado para ser visto por adolescentes, preferentemente con la guía de personas adultas.

Term.Name: C
Term.Definition: For ages 18 and above
Para adultos de 18 años en adelante. Programas aptos para mayores de 18 años.

Term.Name: D
Term.Definition: For ages 18 and above, strictly
Para Adultos. Programas exclusivamente para mayores de 18 años

Term.Name: NG-NFVCB
Nigeria
Term.Definition: Natioanl Film and Video Censor Board

Term.Name: G
General
Term.Definition: The content is considered by the board to be suitable for viewing by persons of all ages.

Term.Name: PG
Parental Guidance
Term.Definition: the themes or content of the film may not, in the opinion of the board, be suitable for all children.

Term.Name: 12A/12
Term.Definition: Suitable for viewing by persons 12 years of age or older but not for children under 12 years of age unless accompanied by an adult
Suitable for viewing by persons over 15 years of age
Suitable for viewing by persons over 18 years of ages

Term.Name: RE
Term.Definition: not suitable for viewing by persons under 18 years of age with certain sensitvities to classification criteria

Term.Name: NL-NICAM
The Netherlands
Term.Definition: Nederlands Institute for the Classification of Audio-visual Media

Term.Name: AL
Term.Definition: Suitable for all ages
Alle leeftijden
Not recommended for viewers younger than 6 years
Let op met kinderen tot 6 jaar
Not recommended for viewers younger than 9 years
Let op met kinderen tot 9 jaar
Not recommended for viewers younger than 12 years
Let op met kinderen tot 12 jaar
Movie shops/cinemas aren't allowed to show these movies to people younger than 16 years
Let op met kinderen tot 16 jaar

Term.Name: NO-Medietilsynet-Om_aldersgrenser
Term.Definition: Norway
Scheme as defined by the Medietilsynet

Term.Name: Alle
Term.Definition: Tillaten for alle
For all
7 år (barn ned til 4 år i følgje med føresette)
7 and older or from 4 in presence of an accompanying adult
11 år (barn ned til 8 år i følgje med føresette)
11 and older or from 8 in presence of an accompanying adult
15 år (unge ned til 12 år i følgje med føresette)
15 and older, not under 12, above 12 in presence of an accompanying adult
18 år (absolutt nedre grense)
Not under 18

Term.Name: NZ-OFLC
Term.Definition: New Zealand
Office of Film and Literature Classification

Term.Name: G
General
Term.Definition: Suitable for general audiences (awarded by the Film and Video Labelling Body and the Office of Film and Literature Classification)

Term.Name: PG
Parental Guidance
Term.Definition: Parental guidance recommended for younger viewers (awarded by the Film and Video Labelling Body and the Office of Film and Literature Classification)

Term.Name: M
Mature
Term.Definition: Suitable for (but not restricted to) mature audiences 16 years and over (awarded by the Film and Video Labelling Body and the Office of Film and Literature Classification)

Term.Name: R13
Term.Definition: Suitable to persons 13 years of age and over (awarded by the Office of Film and Literature Classification only)

Term.Name: R15
Term.Definition: Suitable to persons 15 years of age and over (awarded by the Office of Film and Literature Classification only)

Term.Name: R16
Term.Definition: Suitable to persons 16 years of age and over (awarded by the Office of Film and Literature Classification only)

Term.Name: R18
Term.Definition: Suitable to persons 18 years of age and over (awarded by the Office of Film and Literature Classification only)

Term.Name: R
Restricted
Term.Definition: Restricted to a particular class of persons, or for particular purposes, or both, specified by the Office of Film and Literature Classification

Term.Name: PH-MTRCB
Term.Definition: Movie and Television Review and Classification Board
Lupon sa Pagrerepaso at Pag-uuri ng Sine at Telebisyon

Term.Name: G
Term.Definition: General Patronage. All ages admitted.

Term.Name: PG-13
Term.Definition: Viewers below 13 years old must be accompanied by a parent or an adult.

Term.Name: R-13
Term.Definition: Only those who are 13 and above may view an “R-13” film.

Term.Name: R-18
Term.Definition: Only those who are 13 and above may view an “R-13” film.

Term.Name: PL-RTP
Term.Definition: Portugal
Scheme as used by the Radio Telewisja Polska

Term.Name: G
Term.Definition: For all audiences
For persons of age 10 and above. Parental Guidance is suggested.
For persons of age 12 and above. Parental Guidance is suggested.
For persons of age 16 and above.

Term.Name: R
Term.Definition: Adults only (18 and over)

Term.Name: PT-CCE
Term.Definition: Portugal
Scheme as defined by the Comissão de Classificação de Espectáculos

Term.Name: M/4
Term.Definition: For persons of age 4 and above
os espectáculos de curta duração e de fácil compreensão que não provoquem reacções de pavor e que não colidam com a fantasia e com o sentido lúdico deste nível etário.

Term.Name: M/6
Term.Definition: For persons of age 6 and above
os espectáculos que, pela sua temática ou extensão, não sejam abrangidos pelos critérios fixados para os níveis etários superiores.

Term.Name: M/12
Term.Definition: For persons of age 12 and above
os espectáculos que, pela sua extensão e complexidade, possam provocar nos espectadores de nível etário inferior fadiga excessiva e ou traumatismo psíquico.

Term.Name: M/16
Term.Definition: For persons of age 16 and above
os espectáculos que explorem, em termos excessivos, aspectos da sexualidade e da violência física e psíquica.

Term.Name: M/18
Term.Definition: For persons of age 18 and above
os espectáculos pornográficos e os que explorem formas patológicas de violência física e psíquica.

Term.Name: Pornográficos
Term.Definition: For persons of age 18 and above, sexual content

Serão classificados no 1º escalão (hard-core) os espectáculos que apresentem uma descrição ostensiva e insistente de actos sexuais realmente praticados com exibição dos órgãos genitais; Serão classificados no 2º escalão (soft-core) os espectáculos que apresentem uma descrição ostensiva e insistente de actos sexuais simulados.

Term.Name: De Qualidade
Term.Definition: Of quality from an artistic, thematic, pedagogic or technical realisation perspective
Os espectáculos que, pelos seus aspectos artístico, temático, pedagógico e técnico mereçam esse atributo.

Term.Name: PT-RTP
Term.Definition: Portugal
Scheme as defined by the Radio Televisão Portugal

Term.Name: T
Term.Definition: For all audiences
Todos
For persons of age 10 and above. Parental Guidance is suggested.
For persons of age 12 and above. Parental Guidance is suggested.
For persons of age 16 and above.

Term.Name: SE-SB
Term.Definition: Swedish National Board of Film Censors
Statens biografbyrå

Term.Name: Btl
Term.Definition: Barntillåten
Suitable for all ages
Suitable for children of at least 7 years of age
Suitable for children of at least 11 years of age
No one under 15 years of age admitted
No one under 18 years of age admitted

Term.Name: SG-MDA
Term.Definition: Media Development Authority

Term.Name: G
General
Term.Definition: Suitable for all ages and audiences

Term.Name: PG
Parental Guidance
Term.Definition: Parental supervision is advised

Term.Name: NC16
Term.Definition: No children below 16 years old

Term.Name: M18
Term.Definition: Mature 18 for persons 18 years and above

Term.Name: R21
Term.Definition: Restricted to persons 21 years and above

Term.Name: TR-AISS
Term.Definition: Symbol system for content rating
Akıllı İşaretler Sembol Sistemi

Term.Name: All
Term.Definition: Genel izleyici kitlesi
Suitable for all ages
7 yaş ve üzeri için uygun
Suitable for children of at least 7 years of age
13 yaş ve üzeri için uygun
Suitable for children of at least 11 years of age
18 yaş ve üzeri için uygun
No one under 15 years of age admitted

Term.Name: US-ESRB
Term.Definition: United States
Entertainment Software Rating Board scheme

Term.Name: EC
Term.Definition: Titles rated EC (Early Childhood) have content that may be suitable for ages 3 and older. Contains no material that parents would find inappropriate

Term.Name: E
Term.Definition: Titles rated E (Everyone) have content that may be suitable for ages 6 and older. Titles in this category may contain minimal cartoon, fantasy or mild violence and/or infrequent use of mild language

Term.Name: E10+
Term.Definition: Titles rated E10+ (Everyone 10 and older) have content that may be suitable for ages 10 and older. Titles in this category may contain more cartoon, fantasy or mild violence, mild language and/or minimal suggestive themes

Term.Name: T
Term.Definition: Titles rated T (Teen) have content that may be suitable for ages 13 and older. Titles in this category may contain violence, suggestive themes, crude humour, minimal blood, simulated gambling, and/or infrequent use of strong language

Term.Name: M
Term.Definition: Titles rated M (Mature) have content that may be suitable for persons ages 17 and older. Titles in this category may contain intense violence, blood and gore, sexual content and/or strong language

Term.Name: AO
Term.Definition: Titles rated AO (Adults Only) have content that should only be played by persons 18 years and older. Titles in this category may include prolonged scenes of intense violence and/or graphic sexual content and nudity

Term.Name: RP
Term.Definition: Titles listed as RP (Rating Pending) have been submitted to the ESRB and are awaiting final rating. (This symbol appears only in advertising prior to a game's release)

Term.Name: Alcohol Reference
Term.Definition: Reference to and/or images of alcoholic beverages

Term.Name: Animated Blood
Term.Definition: Discoloured and/or unrealistic depictions of blood

Term.Name: Blood
Term.Definition: Depictions of blood

Term.Name: Blood and Gore
Term.Definition: Depictions of blood or the mutilation of body parts

Term.Name: Cartoon Violence
Term.Definition: Violent actions involving cartoon-like situations and characters. May include violence where a character is unharmed after the action has been inflicted

Term.Name: Comic Mischief
Term.Definition: Depictions or dialogue involving slapstick or suggestive humour

Term.Name: Crude Humour
Term.Definition: Depictions or dialogue involving vulgar antics, including 'bathroom" humour

Term.Name: Drug Reference
Term.Definition: Reference to and/or images of illegal drugs

Term.Name: Edutainment
Term.Definition: Content of product provides user with specific skills development or reinforcement learning within an entertainment setting. Skill development is an integral part of product

Term.Name: Fantasy Violence
Term.Definition: Violent actions of a fantasy nature, involving human or non-human characters in situations easily distinguishable from real life

Term.Name: Informational
Term.Definition: Overall content of product contains data, facts, resource information, reference materials or instructional text

Term.Name: Intense Violence
Term.Definition: Graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict. May involve extreme and/or realistic blood, gore, weapons and depictions of human injury and death

Term.Name: Language
Term.Definition: Mild to moderate use of profanity

Term.Name: Lyrics
Term.Definition: Mild references to profanity, sexuality, violence, alcohol or drug use in music

Term.Name: Mature Humour
Term.Definition: Depictions or dialogue involving "adult" humour, including sexual references

Term.Name: Mild Violence
Term.Definition: Mild scenes depicting characters in unsafe and/or violent situations

Term.Name: Nudity
Term.Definition: Graphic or prolonged depictions of nudity

Term.Name: Partial Nudity
Term.Definition: Brief and/or mild depictions of nudity

Term.Name: Real Gambling
Term.Definition: Player can gamble, including betting or wagering real cash or currency

Term.Name: Sexual Themes
Term.Definition: Mild to moderate sexual references and/or depictions. May include partial nudity

Term.Name: Sexual Violence
Term.Definition: Depictions of rape or other violent sexual acts

Term.Name: Simulated Gambling
Term.Definition: Player can gamble without betting or wagering real cash or currency

Term.Name: Some Adult Assistance May Be Needed
Term.Definition: Intended for very young ages

Term.Name: Strong Language
Term.Definition: Explicit and/or frequent use of profanity

Term.Name: Strong Lyrics
Term.Definition: Explicit and/or frequent references to profanity, sex, violence, alcohol or drug use in music

Term.Name: Strong Sexual Content
Term.Definition: Graphic references to and/or depictions of sexual behaviour, possibly including nudity

Term.Name: Suggestive Themes
Term.Definition: Mild provocative references or materials

Term.Name: Tobacco Reference
Term.Definition: Reference to and/or images of tobacco products

Term.Name: Use of Drugs
Term.Definition: The consumption or use of illegal drugs

Term.Name: Use of Alcohol
Term.Definition: The consumption of alcoholic beverages

Term.Name: Use of Tobacco
Term.Definition: The consumption of tobacco products

Term.Name: Violence
Term.Definition: Scenes involving aggressive conflict

Term.Name: US-MPAA
Term.Definition: United States
Motion Picture Association of America movie rating scheme

Term.Name: G
General
Term.Definition: General audiences. All ages admitted.

Term.Name: PG
Parental Guidance
Term.Definition: Parental guidance suggested. Theme or content may not be suitable for children.

Term.Name: PG-13
Term.Definition: Parents strongly cautioned
Some material may be inappropriate for children under 13.

Term.Name: R
Restricted
Term.Definition: Under 17 requires accompyning parent or adult guardian.

Term.Name: NC-17
Term.Definition: Not one 17 and under admitted.

Term.Name: US-RIAA
Term.Definition: United States
Recording Industry Association of America scheme. Scheme for music rating as defined by the Recording Industry Association of America

Term.Name: Parental Advisory
Term.Definition: The Parental Advisory is a notice to consumers that recordings identified by this value may contain strong language or depiction of violence, sex or substance abuse. Parental discretion is advised

Term.Name: US-TVPG
Term.Definition: United States
The TV Parental Guidelines

Term.Name: TV-Y
Term.Definition: All children

Term.Name: TV-Y7
Term.Definition: Directed to other children above 7

Term.Name: TV-Y7-FV
Term.Definition: Directed to other children above 7 due to fantasy and violent content

Term.Name: TV-G
Term.Definition: General Audience - All ages admitted

Term.Name: TV-PG
Term.Definition: Parental guidance suggested

Term.Name: TV-14
Term.Definition: Parents strongly cautioned

Term.Name: TV-MA
Term.Definition: Mature audience only

Term.Name: ZA-FPB
Term.Definition: Film and Publication Board
South Africa

Term.Name: A
Term.Definition: All ages

Term.Name: PG
Term.Definition: A category with content that may be disturbing to or inappropriate for children

Term.Name: 10M
Term.Definition: Children under the age of 10 years must be accompanied by an adult

Term.Name: 10M-13PG
Term.Definition: Persons under the age of 13 must be accompanied by an adult to any filem classfied 13M, while a DVB or VHS or an interactive computer game classfied 13 PG requires Parental Guidance for persons under the age of 13
10 years and older only
16 years and older only
Adults only

Term.Name: D
Term.Definition: Drug and alocohol abuse

Term.Name: L
Term.Definition: Strong language

Term.Name: N
Term.Definition: Nudity

Term.Name: P
Term.Definition: Biased or prejudiced with regard to race, ethnicity, gender, religion, or other group identifiable characteristics

Term.Name: S
Term.Definition: Sex

Term.Name: V
Term.Definition: Violence
